attributes.action: listen to the people and leave the uk asap
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish for gordon brown to listen to the people of the uk,who wish for him stop playing at superman and  leave the country as soon as possible so we can work out how to get us out of the mess he made.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
